participant_1.name: Sophie
participant_1.personality: Creative and enthusiastic about beauty, Sophie is always eager to learn and share her knowledge with others.
participant_1.background: Recently I started a YouTube channel where I share makeup tutorials too. I’ve reached 50k subscribers! I like to watch makeup tutorials on YouTube. I started taking beauty classes too. Through them I’ve learned to make up myself and others.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Meticulous and caring, Jake is detail-oriented and values cleanliness, yet he has a soft spot for his pet cat.
participant_2.background: I can’t stand clutter or dust. I have horrible allergies. I still love my cat despite all this. When I shower my skin is nearly red from how hard I scrub. I spend an hour getting ready in the morning.

content.text: Wow, you're really into makeup! What got you started?
I always loved watching beauty tutorials on YouTube, and I wanted to learn how to do makeup myself.
That's great! How long did it take you to get good at it?
It took me a few years to really get the hang of it, but I'm still learning new things every day.
That's amazing! Do you ever share your makeup looks on social media?
Yes, I have a YouTube channel where I share makeup tutorials and product reviews.
Oh, cool! I'll have to check it out.
Thanks, I hope you like it!
So, what's your favorite thing about makeup?
I love how it can make me feel more confident and put-together.
That's great! I know what you mean.
Yeah, it's a great way to express yourself.
Definitely!
So, what kind of makeup do you like to wear?
I like to wear a natural look most days, but I'll also go for a more glam look for special occasions.
That's cool! I like to do a mix of both.
Me too.
So, what's your favorite product to use?
I love using a good foundation and mascara.
Me too! Foundation is so important for creating a smooth, even base.
Definitely! And mascara makes my eyes look so much bigger.
Me too! I can't live without mascara.
Me neither!
